=API for javadoc.browse=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.javadoc.browse))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_open-url-in-browser_url) open-url-in-browser] [#(_open-url-in-swing_url) open-url-in-swing] 

----
===(_open-url-in-browser_ url)===
<pre> Opens url (a string) in the default system web browser.  May not
work on all platforms.  Returns url on success, nil if not
supported.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/javadoc/browse.clj#22 Source]
----
===(_open-url-in-swing_ url)===
<pre> Opens url (a string) in a Swing window.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/javadoc/browse.clj#37 Source]
